attributes.additional_details:
Dear Professor Hawkins, 
                                 
It could have happened yesterday the evidence of detecting the time warp tunnel we entered would be the same, its obvious they never looked at all the evidence due to our unbelievable story, and their lack of knowledge of what to look for? 
please I  beg you once again at least read my emails. or send me the where- what and how to look for the evidence they hold, and I'll send another FOI requesting such. 
Michael lewedon
attributes.background:
have tried hear there everywhere. for someone to commission a full scale inquiry and investigation of that mornings events.
we saw a spaceship the size of Wembley stadium we watched this for our 8 minutes.
The MOD archives hold the evidence of time space travel 
something was taken or left
